message.undeadnights.nights_remaining: %s nights remaining until the next Night of the Undead!
message.undeadnights.last_nights: This is the last night before the next Night of the Undead!
message.undeadnights.horde_night: The sun is starting to set and you feel uneasy about the coming night...
message.undeadnights.horde_night_over: You feel at ease, this Night of the Undead is over...
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.title: Undead Nights
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.unde: Enable Nights of the Undead mod?
If enabled, Nights of the Undead (horde nights) are enabled | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.days: Number of days between horde nights (1 = every night is a horde night) | default: 5
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.chan: Chance in % for a horde night | default: 100
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.send: Send message to player with countdown till next horde night
If enabled, each night a message will be sent to the player with how many nights are left before the next Horde Night | default: disabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.dist: Minimum distance a horde will spawn away from the player | default: 70
Maximum distance a horde will spawn away from the player | default: 75
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.zomb: Size of a wave of zombies | default: 15
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.hord: Maximum amount of zombies that can be loaded in the world at the same time | default: 80
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.spaw: Spawn additional waves in a horde night
If enabled, additional waves will spawn in a hoard night | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.cool: Time between checks for next zombie wave (in seconds)
Time in seconds between check for next possible wave in a horde night | default: 45
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.chan: Chance for another zombie wave to spawn (in %)
Chance in % for another zombie wave | default: 7
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.hord: Prevent players from sleeping through horde nights
If enabled, Players can't sleep through horde nights | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.pers: If enabled, , the horde zombies will be persistent and not despawn | default: disabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.zomb: Will horde zombies burn in daylight
If enabled, the horde zombies will burn in daylight | default: disabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.spaw: If enabled, demolition zombies with TNT will spawn | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.chan: Chance for a demolition zombie to spawn (in %)
Chance in % for a demolition zombie to spawn | default: 6
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.demo: Number of TNTs a demolition zombie will spawn with
TNT Stack size a demolition zombie will spawn with (0 = unlimited) | default: 3
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.spaw: If enabled, elite zombies will spawn | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.chan: Chance for an elite zombie to spawn (in %)
Chance in % for an elite zombie to spawn | default: 3
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.spaw: Spawn stray horde zombies (on normal nights)
If enabled, single stray horde zombies can spawn on normal nights | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.undeadnights.option.prin: If enabled, debug messages will be logged out | default: disabled
